Plot: Lieutenant Davenport's sanity was nearly shattered by two murder investigations. Now he faces something worse . . . Two killers. One hideously scarred. The other strikingly handsome, a master manipulator fascinated with all aspects of death. The dark mirror of Davenport's soul . . . This is the case that will bring Davenport back to life. Or push him over the edge.
Characters: Lucas Davenport, Del Capslock, Randy Whitcomb, Jennifer Carey, Carlo Druze, Stephanie Bekker, Dr. Michael Bekker, Loverboy (Eyes of Prey), Quentin Daniel, Cassie Lasch, Marty McKenzie, Sloan (Eyes of Prey), Sister Mary Joseph, Sybil Hart, Dr. Larry Merriam, Elizabeth Armistead
